questiontext.text:
This is a minimal STACK question using Meclib library..It is designed as a template with two example objects a fix and a spring.

Meclib is a way of creating JSXGraph questions using only maxima in the question variables.

You can see a list of all available MecLib objects here https://github.com/mkraska/meclib/wiki/List-of-Objects

To modify the output change the values in the initdata array in the quesitons variables fields.

[[jsxgraph width='500px' height='400px' ]] var mode = "STACK"; // as opposed to "jsfiddle" which is used in the test environment var stateRef; // is empty in the non-interactive case const initstring = {#init#}; // injection of the list of objects const centeredLabelStyle = {size:0, showInfobox:false, label:{offset:[-6,0], anchorX:'left', anchorY:'middle'}}; [[include src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mkraska/meclib/main/meclib.js" /]] [[/jsxgraph]]
